channel.title: wayn on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in wayn on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bye bye wayn.com
item.description: 09:06 Tuesday 02 June 2015 JST Good luck with your site. I'm blocking you as spam because of the way you set up the email link. My friend wanted to connect with me so I click YES in the email, but the screen to which I am sent is a New Account screen with no login option. I then visited wayn.com directly and via cookies you still said Please Register instead of giving a login screen.
